recipe.title: Spiced Cake
recipe.comment: c/o Fresh Mag with Cazzie tweaks
recipe.ingredient: 220gms pineapple in pieces in natural juices
recipe.step: Grease a 25cm spring form pan and place a piece of baking powder at the bottom.
Sift flour, baking soda and bicarb soda into a large bowl.
In a separate bowl place eggs, vanilla, oil, sugar and reserved pineapple juice and mix well with whisk.
Pour wet ingredients into flour bowl and mix until just combined.
Stir in grated carrots and blitzed pineapple, mixed through until all mixed through dough.
Pour into cake tin and cook for 45-60 mins, or until skewer comes out clean from the middle.
Serve with butter or cream if desired.
